## Note
MosqueSteps uses mosque data from [OpenStreetMap](https://www.openstreetmap.org/). You can also contribute directly by [editing the map](https://www.openstreetmap.org/edit). Your contribution will automatically appear in MosqueSteps once OSM updates.
